залупа
It's pretty good, but there's a bug where the people I play against keep calling me poop head.

What I Personally love about this game, and the reason why I hit over 100h within the first week, is simply because there's so much Action, while at the same time you can feel like you are both in and out of the Advantage.

Sometimes the killers might bring ''OP''perks and slaughter you in a couple of minutes, sometimes the Survivors Pops the Generators, in a couple of MInutes. It's very double sided dependent on skills! 

So I'd highly recommend buying it, jump in play some games! get some friends into it and play for hours!

Love it. Theres no asymetrical game quite like it. Both survivor and killer are rewarding and fun to play, and the devs keep the game fun with new content and characters as well as community events. Kinda scary the first time you play but i promise you get used to it! Its quite addicting!

Pros: I get to practice being a serial killer.

Cons: Literally unplayable most games due to actual meaningful actions crashing the game these days. (And yes my pc is hot garbage but I could run this game perfectly fine for years).

Also licensed killers/survivors/perks hidden behind paywalls makes it pay to win to a pretty big extent unless you want to invest years praying for the shrine to give you A tier perks.
